subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free-agent guard Devin Harris is headed back to the Dallas Mavericks, nine years after starting his career with them, the Dallas star Dirk Nowitzki said.
snippet: The free-agent guard Devin Harris is headed back to the Dallas Mavericks, nine years after starting his career with them, the Dallas star Dirk Nowitzki said.
